name: Socialist Union of Workers
startIntroPart1: Not for an empire, but for the people!
startIntroPart2: Let the industry expand our nation for the people!
declaringWar: I'm afraid it is in our best interest to stop you.
attacked: We've otherthrown an empire far stronger than you. Don't even try.
defeated: You have clearly out matched us in tactics and resources. We will break free once again.
introduction: Ah, more people. I hope you don't mind our independence.
neutralNo: That would go against our interests.
hateLetsHearIt: Are you going to tell me or what?
hateNo: I can't allow that to happen.
Ha, as if i'd let you.
afterPeace: I believe ending this fight benefits us both.
